definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
lit. hair and beard all in one stroke/fig. to handle different things by the same method/one method to solve all problems/one size fits all
pinyin: tou2 fa5 hu2 zi5 yi1 ba3 zhua1

sentences.english: Her hair flowed over her shoulder.
Those two girls do their hair in the same way.
sentences.chinese: 那两个女孩把头发梳成相同的式样。

sentences.english: But there shall not an hair of your head perish.
sentences.chinese: 然而你们连一根头发，也必不损坏。

sentences.english: At the mean time, the vulture went by. The potion was polluted by the unexpectedly fallen hair.
sentences.chinese: 同时，秃鹰正巧经过，秃鹰的头发无意间落入魔药内。

sentences.english: A cold breeze 19)wafted through my hair.
sentences.chinese: 寒冷的微风吹过我的头发。

sentences.english: He had thick black hair and hadn't shaved for a day or two.
sentences.chinese: 他厚厚的黑头发，并没有削发为一或两天。

sentences.english: Doris:I think because I turned on the air conditioner right after showering and before I blow-dried my hair.
sentences.chinese: 大概是我刚刚洗完澡没吹头发又立刻开冷气的关系吧。

sentences.english: You messed up your hair riding so hard.
sentences.chinese: 你骑得那么卖劲，把头发都弄乱了。

sentences.english: I'm in the mood for redheads.
sentences.chinese: 我现在喜欢红头发的姑娘。

sentences.english: She looked angelic with her hair covered in snow.
sentences.chinese: 雪落满了她的头发使她看起来像天使。

sentences.english: We can keep our hair tidy with a comb.
sentences.chinese: 我们能用梳子来保持头发的整洁。

sentences.english: She was twirling her hair absentmindedly.
sentences.chinese: 她心不在焉地卷曲自己的头发。

sentences.english: He smothers his hair with grease, eg hair-oil.
sentences.chinese: 他的头发因涂了油而发亮。

sentences.english: A thin, white-haired man was sitting on a wooden seat.
sentences.chinese: 一个瘦削而头发全白的人正坐在一个木头凳子上。

sentences.english: and damaging, but it's a lot healthier.
sentences.chinese: 也会伤害头发，但总体来说更健康。

sentences.english: This is because the outer cuticle layer of the hair fiber is broken and flaked.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为角质层层外的头发纤维被破坏成片状。

definition: to wash one's hair/to have a shampoo
